Review Name: Mind-blowing purchase Review Description: I bought this AC in March and this is the latest AC in the market. I really wanted to appreciate Flipkart for providing services at my home town. Flipkart service is really great!! But I see some improvement at installation as the installation people couldn't spend much time for explaining about the features. Also we were unable to see what all items and parts came along with the box. It is good if service person can show the items came within box and the additional parts broght by him.
